sentences.en: ...a team clearing an area littered with unexploded ordnance.
sentences.cn: ...一个在四处留有未爆炸武器的地区排爆的小组。

sentences.en: All non - EOD explosive ordnance disposal personnel must evacuate immediately.
sentences.cn: 所有 非 排弹人员立刻撤离.

sentences.en: An Ordnance Survey grid reference gives the position of a place to within 100 metres.
sentences.cn: 全国地形测量局的地图坐标标示某地的位置精确到100米以內.

sentences.en: First naval ordnance reliability model are made according to the function structure of naval ordnance.
sentences.cn: 本文首先根据舰炮的结构,建立了舰炮系统的功能框图,进而得出可靠性模型.

sentences.en: NORINCO ( G ) is sometimes referred to as the Ordnance Industry Group.
sentences.cn: Norinco时常也叫做兵器工业集团.

sentences.en: Ordnance Officer ordered all the port cannon to be heaved to starboard to counteract the list.
sentences.cn: 炮长命令将左舷所有大炮移到右舷以抵消倾斜,但是甲板的倾斜度还在加大.

sentences.en: She worked in an ordnance factory during the war.
sentences.cn: 战争期间她在一家兵工厂工作.

sentences.en: Shoes and clothing for the army were scarce, ordnance supplies and drugs were scarcer.
sentences.cn: 军队很缺鞋和衣服, 武器供应和药品就更少了.

sentences.en: So a decision - making model of urgency ordnance transportation based on simulation is established.
sentences.cn: 针对这一不足,在已有模型的基础上,建立了一种基于仿真的军械调运决策模型.

sentences.en: The Ordnance Officer ordered all the port cannon to be heaved.
sentences.cn: 炮长命令把左舷长所有大炮搬到.

sentences.en: The Ordnance Officer ordered all the port cannon to to starboard to counteract the list.
sentences.cn: 炮长命令把左舷上所有大炮搬到右舷上来以抵消船的倾斜.

sentences.en: The special and high risk enhances the necessity cany on safety evaluation in the ordnance industry.
sentences.cn: 兵器工业自身固有的特殊性和高危险性,决定了其开展安全评价的必要性.

sentences.en: This paper analyses the mixed multi - attribute characteristic of ordnance urgency decision - making.
sentences.cn: 分析了军械紧急调运方案优选决策的混合多属性特点.

sentences.en: To make the decision more practical, the uncertainty in actual ordnance transportation must be considered.
sentences.cn: 为了使决策具有更大实用价值, 在决策时必须考虑这种实际调运过程中存在的不确定性.

sentences.en: Urgent ordnance transport on single requirement point is familiar in ordnance transport.
sentences.cn: 单个需求点军械紧急调运是军械调运工作中常见情况.

sentences.en: With cargo projectile by the world , serious problem of unexploded ordnance arisen.
sentences.cn: 子母弹药的应用与发展带来了严重的未爆弹药问题.

phrases.tran_cn: 未爆炸军火；未爆炸武器

trans.tran_cn: 大炮，军械（如弹药、军车等），军用品，军需品，军械署
trans.tran_en: weapons, explosives, and vehicles used in fighting
